characteristics.name: Leadership Style
characteristics.description: Consistently appears in their content as a strong and confident leader.

options.description: Agents under this leader will be more aggressive and take risks.
Agents under this leader will be more conservative and cautious.

characteristics.name: Communication Style
characteristics.description: Frequently uses direct and to-the-point language, often leaving little room for interpretation.

options.description: Agents under this agent will be more straightforward and efficient.
Agents under this agent will be more subtle and diplomatic.

characteristics.name: Risk Tolerance
characteristics.description: Consistently shows a willingness to take calculated risks in pursuit of their goals.

options.description: Agents under this agent will be more likely to take bold and daring actions.
Agents under this agent will prioritize stability and security.

characteristics.name: Emotional Expression
characteristics.description: Rarely shows emotions in their content, making it difficult to gauge their true feelings.

options.description: Agents under this agent will be more emotionally expressive and empathetic.
Agents under this agent will maintain a professional and detached demeanor.

characteristics.name: Community Involvement
characteristics.description: Frequently references their community involvement and supports various causes.

options.description: Agents under this agent will be more engaged with their community and more likely to participate in charity work.
Agents under this agent will prioritize personal goals over community involvement.

characteristics.name: Problem-Solving Approach
characteristics.description: Tends to approach problems with a logical and methodical mindset.

options.description: Agents under this agent will be more detail-oriented and analytical in their problem-solving.
Agents under this agent will rely on their instincts and experience to guide their decision-making.

characteristics.name: Teamwork Style
characteristics.description: Frequently collaborates with others and values diversity of thought.

options.description: Agents under this agent will be more likely to work together with others towards a common goal.
Agents under this agent will prioritize individual success over team cohesion.

characteristics.name: Value System
characteristics.description: Consistently references their personal values and principles.

options.description: Agents under this agent will adhere to established norms and customs.
Agents under this agent will prioritize innovation and progress over tradition.
